name: Cloud RAG Document Chatbot
description: An interactive RAG chatbot that answers questions from documents using semantic search, re-ranking, and LLMs (Llama 3, Groq) to deliver source-backed answers.

name: Local-First RAG Chatbot
description: A RAG chatbot that runs a local LLM (Phi-3) to have conversations with multiple PDF documents, using Pinecone for vector storage and Streamlit for the UI.

name: CPU Scheduling Algorithms
description: A Python implementation of various CPU scheduling algorithms (e.g., Banker's, SJF, Round Robin) with Gantt chart visualizations and performance statistics.

name: Digital Steganography
description: A Java application that embeds and extracts secret text messages within digital images using the Least Significant Bit (LSB) steganography technique.
